member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.PersonalizerClient
member.summary: Personalizer Service is an Azure Cognitive Service that makes it easy to target content and experiences without complex pre-analysis or cleanup of past data. Given a context and featurized content, the Personalizer Service returns your content in a ranked list. As rewards are sent in response to the ranked list, the reinforcement learning algorithm will improve the model and improve performance of future rank calls.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankRequest
member.summary: Request a set of actions to be ranked by the Personalizer service.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankRequest.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RankRequest class.
Initializes a new instance of the RankRequest class.
member.param: The set of actions the Personalizer service can pick from. The set should not contain more than 50 actions. The order of the actions does not affect the rank result but the order should match the sequence your application would have used to display them.

Features of the context used for Personalizer as a dictionary of dictionaries. This depends on the application, and typically includes features about the current user, their device, profile information, data about time and date, etc.
The set of action ids to exclude from ranking.

Optionally pass an eventId that uniquely identifies this Rank event. If null, the service generates a unique eventId. The eventId will be used for associating this request with its reward, as well as seeding the pseudo-random generator when making a Personalizer call.

Send false if the user will see the rank results, therefore Personalizer will expect a Reward call, otherwise it will assign the default Reward to the event. Send true if it is possible the user will not see the rank results, because the page is rendering later, or the Rank results may be overridden by code further downstream.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankRequest.ContextFeatures
member.summary: Gets or sets features of the context used for Personalizer as a dictionary of dictionaries. This depends on the application, and typically includes features about the current user, their device, profile information, data about time and date, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankRequest.Actions
member.summary: Gets or sets the set of actions the Personalizer service can pick from. The set should not contain more than 50 actions. The order of the actions does not affect the rank result but the order should match the sequence your application would have used to display them.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankRequest.ExcludedActions
member.summary: Gets or sets the set of action ids to exclude from ranking.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankRequest.EventId
member.summary: Gets or sets optionally pass an eventId that uniquely identifies this Rank event. If null, the service generates a unique eventId. The eventId will be used for associating this request with its reward, as well as seeding the pseudo-random generator when making a Personalizer call.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankRequest.DeferActivation
member.summary: Gets or sets send false if the user will see the rank results, therefore Personalizer will expect a Reward call, otherwise it will assign the default Reward to the event. Send true if it is possible the user will not see the rank results, because the page is rendering later, or the Rank results may be overridden by code further downstream.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankRequest.Validate
member.summary: Validate the object.
member.exception: Thrown if validation fails

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankResponse
member.summary: A resulting ordered list of actions that result from a rank request.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankResponse.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RankResponse class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankResponse.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankedAction},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RankResponse class.
member.param: The calculated ranking for the current request.
The eventId for the round trip from request to response.

The action chosen by the Personalizer service. This is the action for which to report the reward. This might not be the first found in 'ranking' if an action in the request in first position was part of the excluded ids.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankResponse.Ranking
member.summary: Gets the calculated ranking for the current request.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankResponse.EventId
member.summary: Gets the eventId for the round trip from request to response.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Personalizer.Models.RankResponse.RewardActionId
member.summary: Gets the action chosen by the Personalizer service. This is the action for which to report the reward. This might not be the first found in 'ranking' if an action in the request in first position was part of the excluded ids.
